entry.source: 〉 You have found the demon in{F801}question...{F801}{F802}〉 The demon seems to have lost its{F801}mind. The only way to stop it is to{F801}defeat it and hope it calms down.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You have found the demon in{F801}question...{F801}{F802}〉 The demon seems to have lost its{F801}mind. The only way to stop it is to{F801}defeat it and hope it calms down.{F801}
